name: Survival On a Forgotten World
description: Click the arrows to make the game full screen.  This is a survival game that plays like a hex and chit board game.  You have crashed on an alien planet and must make your way to civilization.  In order to survive you will have to hunt, search for water and sleep if possible.  This lost world contains vicious dinosaurs that will attack you at every opportunity.  Survival on a Forgotten World is written in HTML5 Canvas, JavaScript and Jquery.  Watch this video to learn how to play the game:
